title: epi_b0_correct.py
description: B0 distortion correction tool using an acquired frequency (phase) image.

prefix.title: Output prefix
prefix.description: Prefix of output files; can include path.

input_freq.title: Input frequency dataset
input_freq.description: Phase dataset (frequency volume); should be at similar resolution and FOV as the EPI dataset; must be scaled appropriately.

input_epi.title: Input EPI dataset
input_epi.description: EPI dataset to which B0 distortion correction will be applied.

input_magn.title: Input magnitude dataset
input_magn.description: Magnitude dataset from which to estimate brain mask; can be used for QC imaging.

input_anat.title: Input anatomical dataset
input_anat.description: Anatomical dataset to be used as underlay for QC images (optional).

input_json.title: Input EPI JSON
input_json.description: JSON file containing parameters about the EPI dataset.

epi_pe_dir.title: EPI PE direction
epi_pe_dir.description: Direction (axis) of phase encoding, e.g., AP, PA, RL, ...

epi_pe_bwpp.title: EPI PE bandwidth per pixel
epi_pe_bwpp.description: Bandwidth per pixel (in Hz) in the EPI dataset along the phase encode direction.

epi_pe_echo_sp.title: EPI PE echo spacing
epi_pe_echo_sp.description: Effective TE spacing of the phase encoded volume, in seconds.

epi_pe_vox_dim.title: EPI PE voxel dimension
epi_pe_vox_dim.description: Voxel size along the EPI dataset's phase encode axis, in mm.

scale_freq.title: Scale frequency
scale_freq.description: Scale to apply to frequency volume to match units (def: SF=1.0).

out_cmds.title: Output commands script
out_cmds.description: Name for output script recording commands (def: PREFIX_cmds.tcsh).

out_pars.title: Output parameters file
out_pars.description: Name for output text file recording relevant parameters (def: PREFIX_pars.txt).

blur_sigma.title: Blur sigma
blur_sigma.description: Amount of blurring to apply to masked phase encode dataset (def: BS=9).

do_recenter_freq.title: Recenter frequency method
do_recenter_freq.description: Method to recenter the phase volume within the brain mask (def: MC=mode).

mask_dilate.title: Mask dilation parameters
mask_dilate.description: Erosion and dilation parameters for automask (when using magnitude image).

no_clean.title: No clean temporary files
no_clean.description: Don't remove the temporary directory of intermediate files.

qc_box_focus_ulay.title: QC box focus underlay
qc_box_focus_ulay.description: Focus the QC images on an automask region of the underlay dataset.

ver.title: Version
ver.description: Display program version number in terminal.

date.title: Date
date.description: Display date of program's last update in terminal.
